DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess left atrial pacing therapy in patients with atrial dyssynchrony syndrome and heart failure with preserved ejection fraction.
DOC.brief_title: LEft Atrial Pacing in Diastolic Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 65 Sinus rhythm, PR < 220ms, QRS < 110ms Heart failure (NYHA class IIIIV or II with hospitalization for heart failure) Ejection Fraction > 50%, restrictive mitral inflow, Lateral E/e' > 12 or septal E/e' > 15, Left atrial index volume > 34 ml/m² Atrial dyssynchrony syndrome: (TTE) interatrial time delay ≥ 70ms (difference between tricuspid and mitral PA intervals or between mitral and tricupsid PA' intervals with DTI) Left atrioventricular asynchrony: Time Difference between tricupsid and mitral A wave duration ≥ 35ms.
DOC.keyword: Heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
